p: Roswell Park Memorial Institute (RPMI)-1640, fetal calf serum, and phytohaemagglutinin-P were procured from Gibco BRL (Invitrogen Co., Carlsbad, CA, USA). Colchicine (Loba Chemie Pvt Ltd., Mumbai, India), Giemsa stain solution [E. Merck (India) Ltd., Mumbai, India], and CPA [Biochem (India) Ltd., Mumbai, India] were also acquired. 5-Bromo-2-deoxyuridine was purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). All other chemicals and solvents used were of analytical grade and highest purity available.
